result.title: 2011-Present Eastern Inshore Fisheries and Conservation Authority (Eastern IFCA) Horseshoe Point cockle surveys
result.name: 2011-present-eastern-inshore-fisheries-and-conservation-authority-eastern-ifca-horseshoe-point-1
result.notes: Since January 2011, Eastern IFCA have carrried out foot surveys at Horseshoe Point, Lincolnshire for the purpose of a cockle (Cerastoderma edule) stock assessment and monitoring, and to assess the possibility of opening the fishery if deemed viable. The surveys have been carried out bi-annually where possible, otherwise surveys have been conducted annually.

extras.value: ["Data is freely available for research or commercial use providing that the originators are acknowledged in any publications produced. Charts are not to be used for navigation."]
Eastern Inshore Fisheries and Conservation Authority (originator, custodian)

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
